# x

**Instance Property**

The location of the point along the x-axis of the map.

## Declaration

```swift
var x: Double
```

## Getting the point coordinates

- **y**: The location of the point along the y-axis of the map.
- **coordinate**: A 2D coordinate that corresponds to the latitude and longitude of the specified map point.
